original_title: Fast Food Jingles by an Airplane Hijacker
overview: I met Muhammad in 2015 in Inglewood, California through the Goddess Bunny.  He wanted me to help him shoot some little videos for his music.  He wrote gospel songs, jingles for fast food chains, and hip-hop.  One of his rap songs was called "The Little Dick Blues."  We didn't get to shoot more than a day because he threatened the White House and got sent back to jail.
title: Fast Food Jingles by an Airplane Hijacker
